translations: n.[水文] 雾凇；白霜；结晶

phrs.translation: 雾凇, 华姿伊, 结晶, 白霜
输出时光, 输出时候
雾凇, 雾淞, 软淞, 软雾凇
雾凇, 霜淞, 霜凇
霜冰, 霜状冰, 雾冰
霜雾, 白雾, 淞雾

sentences.sentence: This rime increased, layer upon layer, across Ginnungagap.
sentences.translation: 这雾凇一层又一层地增加，横跨了太古空隙。

sentences.sentence: The frozen droplets are called rime.
All the different types of snow crystals can be found decorated with rime.
sentences.translation: 所有不同类型的雪晶上都缀有霜。
